scripts.postinstall: curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dreidev/gitflow/develop/contrib/gitflow-installer.sh > gitflow-installer.sh; chmod a+x gitflow-installer.sh;npm i -g breakout-timeline; sudo bash gitflow-installer.sh install stable
scripts.postuninstall: curl https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dreidev/gitflow/develop/contrib/gitflow-installer.sh > gitflow-installer.sh; chmod a+x gitflow-installer.sh;npm un -g breakout-timeline; sudo bash gitflow-installer.sh uninstall
